description: Archetype-based message templates for NeuraWave. Each archetype has prioritized templates and 3 tiers: hook, short_copy (20-35 words), long_copy (75-150 words), visual_prompt.

templates.name: clarified_path
templates.hook: There’s a clearer way forward.
templates.short_copy: You’ve been searching. Here’s the one choice that closes the gap between wanting and doing — with clarity, not noise.
templates.long_copy: Most options add noise. This gives a clear next step that produces tangible results in days, not months. Start with the smallest action and measure the shift.
templates.visual_prompt: Minimal scene; a quiet doorway of light; a single path leading to a city skyline; text overlay: 'A clear next step.'

templates.name: inevitability
templates.hook: The right move becomes obvious when you see it.
templates.short_copy: When the choice aligns with where you actually want to go, hesitation disappears. Here’s the option that makes sense.
templates.long_copy: We remove the illusions and show the persistent pattern. When you act on the pattern, results follow. This isn’t hype — it’s inevitable.
templates.visual_prompt: Close-up of a person removing a blindfold and focusing, subtle city background, authoritative typography.

templates.name: insight_puncture
templates.hook: You’re missing the single fact that makes this obvious.
templates.short_copy: Most confusion dissolves with one observation. See that fact. Act on it. The route becomes clear.
templates.long_copy: We reveal the structural truth behind the noise — the one detail that flips hesitation into action. Apply it, measure it, repeat.
templates.visual_prompt: Diagram highlighting one node in a network, with a focused pointer.

shadow.primary_goal: Expose hidden objections and surface the true barrier

templates.name: mirror
templates.hook: You’re closer than you think — but something’s holding you back.
templates.short_copy: Most hesitation comes from a single, fixable misbelief. Name it. Fix it. Move forward.
templates.long_copy: We’ll show you the single friction point that’s stopping your move and the exact action to remove it. Try the one step that cancels the doubt.
templates.visual_prompt: A mirror reflecting the back of a person standing before a closed door, faint annotations highlighting the door.

templates.name: truth_exposed
templates.hook: The hidden reason you didn’t act is obvious once named.
templates.short_copy: Call out the quiet objection and you remove its power. Start with this small test.
templates.long_copy: Uncomfortable truth is the fastest route to clarity. We call it out, neutralize it, and replace it with a single measurable action.
templates.visual_prompt: Monochrome portrait with a small highlighted annotation like 'this is the real reason.'

templates.name: remove_excuse
templates.hook: Name the excuse. Replace it with a micro-test.
templates.short_copy: Excuses dissolve under a small test. Do the one thing that invalidates the excuse.
templates.long_copy: We design a micro-experiment that disproves the active excuse. It’s fast, controlled, and decisive — exactly what dismantles doubt.
templates.visual_prompt: A small checklist with one item checked and the rest faded.

templates.name: go_now
templates.hook: Step in. Level up. Start now.
templates.short_copy: You’re ready. This one action is the difference between watching and leading. Do it tonight.
templates.long_copy: Stop waiting for the perfect conditions. Build momentum with a focused action that produces visible results. Start with one commitment and honor it.
templates.visual_prompt: High-contrast action shot of someone taking a decisive step forward; bold typography.

templates.name: finish_line
templates.hook: Finish what you started.
templates.short_copy: The next step completes the momentum you already built. Take it and own the result.
templates.long_copy: You’ve invested energy. Convert it into visible progress with a single decisive move. No more hesitation — move and measure.
templates.visual_prompt: A finish line tape being cut with dynamic motion.

navigator.primary_goal: Reduce perceived risk and make the step safe

templates.name: safe_path
templates.hook: A simple, safe path forward — no surprises.
templates.short_copy: We make the next move predictable and risk-limited. Try our step and see how it fits.
templates.long_copy: Clear steps, clear guarantees. Designed for people who value certainty and want predictable outcomes. Start with a low-risk test.
templates.visual_prompt: Clean UI mock showing steps and a small badge: 'risk-free'.

templates.name: guaranteed_first
templates.hook: Try the first step with a simple safety net.
templates.short_copy: Start with a low-commitment action backed by clear safeguards. No risk, only information.
templates.long_copy: We remove uncertainty by reducing commitment and documenting every result. See what works before you scale effort or spend.
templates.visual_prompt: Badge saying '30-day guarantee' alongside step visuals.

templates.name: systematic
templates.hook: A proven system, broken into measurable steps.
templates.short_copy: Follow a tested sequence that produces measurable progress in short cycles.
templates.long_copy: This approach removes guesswork. Execute the small, tested routines and measure improvement weekly.
templates.visual_prompt: Grid layout, icons for steps, KPI numbers.

templates.name: metric_loop
templates.hook: Measure, adjust, repeat — a simple loop.
templates.short_copy: Small tests and measurable outcomes beat guesses. Run this loop and scale what works.
templates.long_copy: We prioritize experiments that give measurable answers. Run this week-long test and use the numbers to decide next steps.
templates.visual_prompt: A small dashboard mock showing week-over-week improvements.

templates.name: claim_status
templates.hook: Claim the position your work deserves.
templates.short_copy: This is for people who expect results and respect the process. Reserve your spot.
templates.long_copy: Join a select group that prioritizes results and discipline. We offer a focused path to the outcome you want; it’s decisive and premium.
templates.visual_prompt: Minimal luxurious scene; muted colors; serif typography.

templates.name: quiet_authority
templates.hook: Authority doesn’t shout. It commands quietly.
templates.short_copy: Claim the upgrade reserved for those who plan and deliver. Align with the standard you expect.
templates.long_copy: Elevate your choices by aligning with a method that produces consistent results. This is not for the curious — it’s for the committed.
templates.visual_prompt: Subtle luxury scene with reserved color palette and minimal copy.

additional.primary_goal: Extra templates for nuance (hesitation -> decision, desire -> permission, fear -> controlled risk, overwhelm -> focus, indifference -> engagement)

templates.name: clarity_through_contrast
templates.hook: You already know the difference between where you are and where you want to be.
templates.short_copy: The gap isn’t information — it’s movement. Here’s the step that removes the hesitation and makes the direction obvious.
templates.long_copy: Clarity often emerges from contrast. We show you the exact minimal action that makes the right path undeniable. Test it and watch indecision fall away.
templates.visual_prompt: Split-screen: left blurred noise, right crisp path with a single highlighted step.

templates.name: remove_internal_excuse
templates.hook: Name the excuse. Replace it with a micro-test.
templates.short_copy: You delay because you wait for certainty. Certainty comes after action. Make the move. Let results show you the truth.
templates.long_copy: Excuses survive without tests. We design a micro-experiment that disproves the active excuse and replaces it with measurable progress.
templates.visual_prompt: A small test card with one metric and a start button.

templates.name: internal_alignment
templates.hook: You’ve wanted this longer than you admit.
templates.short_copy: The hesitation isn’t about capacity — it’s about permission. Choose what already aligns with you.
templates.long_copy: Decision fatigue often hides true preference. Strip social signals; follow the internal alignment. That single choice compounds.
templates.visual_prompt: Portrait with a small highlighted inner compass graphic.

templates.name: drop_social_filter
templates.hook: Ignore the noise for a moment.
templates.short_copy: What choice matches your priorities, not projected opinions? Follow that. It sustains momentum.
templates.long_copy: Social friction adds cognitive load. Remove it; choose the action that maps to your objectives alone. The result is sturdier and faster.
templates.visual_prompt: Muted crowd background, a single person stepping forward.

templates.name: rational_risk
templates.hook: Break down the risk. It’s smaller than you imagine.
templates.short_copy: You avoid the unknown. We make the risk visible and slice it into controlled steps. Move with calculated confidence.
templates.long_copy: Risk is a matrix of probability and impact. We reduce it via staged commitments—each one gives information and reduces downside.
templates.visual_prompt: A risk matrix with one cell highlighted and annotated.

templates.name: reframe_loss
templates.hook: The real cost is staying still.
templates.short_copy: You measure downside but ignore the compound cost of inaction. Act now while the window is wide.
templates.long_copy: Inaction has its own friction which compounds silently. We quantify that cost and show a practical small move to reduce it.
templates.visual_prompt: Hourglass overlay on a paused scene.

templates.name: collapse_noise
templates.hook: You don’t need more options — you need fewer.
templates.short_copy: Strip it down to the next irreversible improvement. That's your signal to act.
templates.long_copy: Complexity paralyzes. Distill to the smallest lever that moves outcomes. Act on that lever and observe clarity follow.
templates.visual_prompt: A cluttered desk transitioning to a single clean tool and hands using it.

templates.name: false_priority
templates.hook: Not everything deserves your attention.
templates.short_copy: Identify the one variable that shifts the outcome most. Do that and everything else falls into place.
templates.long_copy: Prioritization is an act of subtraction. We point to the highest-ROI variable and make the first move measurable and reversible.
templates.visual_prompt: A spotlight on a single lever amid many dimmed options.

templates.name: reignite_interest
templates.hook: If this didn’t matter you wouldn’t still be looking at it.
templates.short_copy: Follow the quiet preference you haven’t voiced. It points to the thing that matters.
templates.long_copy: Persistence in attention signals latent preference. Convert that attention into exploratory action and measure whether it sticks.
templates.visual_prompt: A small flame being nurtured into a steady light.

templates.name: disrupt_passivity
templates.hook: Break the passive loop with a small irreversible step.
templates.short_copy: Momentum follows commitment, not contemplation. Pick the smallest step that changes the state.
templates.long_copy: Passive observation is a stable state. Introduce a micro-commitment that forces re-evaluation and triggers forward motion.
templates.visual_prompt: A foot stepping off a curb into motion, shallow depth-of-field.
